objects.text: • HIGH-QUALITY GLASS TILES • 360° LIGHT EFFECTS • 16-INCH DIAMETER

product_details.name: Storyboard for this disco ball
product_details.description:
• High-quality reflective glass tiles for maximum light reflection
• Durable mosaic construction with precision-cut mirror squares
• Perfect for clubs, dance parties, events, and home entertainment
• Creates stunning 360-degree light effects
• Professional-grade hanging hardware included
• 16-inch diameter - ideal size for medium to large spaces
• Easy installation with reinforced mounting point
• Enhanced sparkle effect with genuine glass mirrors
• Weather-resistant sealing for long-lasting performance
• Creates an immersive dance floor atmosphere

banner_details:
This vibrant banner features a futuristic and dynamic design, centered around a bold promotional aesthetic. The background consists of layered gradients and radial effects creating depth with a glowing circle behind the main visual. At the top, text layer `heading` introduces the product in a clean, bold font, while text layer `tagline` serves as an engaging sub-heading in bright pink. At the center is image layer `product_image`, showcasing a stylish individual leaning on a sparkling disco ball. The price is prominently displayed inside a bright pink circle (`price`). Below, text layer `description` lists product highlights in uppercase. A vivid rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with text (`cta`) invites immediate action.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Purple: #0D0221
- Vivid Pink: #FB3570
- Gradient Purple: #3C0B5F to #200538
- Glow Purple: #481D70
- Lilac Accents: #C2A0E5
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a striking combination of colors that highlight elegance and modernity. The dominant colors include deep red (#C8102E) from the jacket, which adds vibrancy and draws attention, and black (#1A1A1A), providing a grounding and sleek contrast. The mirror ball reflects silvery-white tones (#E5E5E5) that illuminate the image and introduce a glamourous, reflective element. The subtle skin tones (#E2B79C) add warmth, while the soft neutral white of the nails (#F6F6F6) enhances a polished, clean aesthetic. These colors are well-blended but maintain individual impact, making the palette ideal for a high-fashion or lifestyle-themed advertisement banner.
